subject: Golf
Football
Phoenix Open (Golf)
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Keegan Bradley had four tickets to Super Bowl XLIX and a 9:15 a.m. tee time for the final round of the Phoenix Open, and other professional golfers faced the same rush.
snippet: Keegan Bradley had four tickets to Super Bowl XLIX and a 9:15 a.m. tee time for the final round of the Phoenix Open, and other professional golfers faced the same rush.
